name: Warhead Destined
description:
Warhead Destined is a dungeon delving action roleplaying game. It features custom made 2d art never before seen in another game. The game is about grinding loot to be strong enough to beat bosses and advance to the next dungeon theme.

Features


  • Loot.
  • Dungeon delving.
  • Fun boss mechanics.
  • Inventory.
  • Original art and music.
  • Different weapons do different things, like leeching life, knocking back foe or teleporting you.
  • Steam Achievements.
  • Efficient and convenient Save system - save when you want to save, anywhere!
